title: 2B/2B, Courtesy patrol, Situated in North Las Vegas!
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '2', 'Square Feet:', '1056', 'Address:', '770 West Lone Mountain Road', 'Your search for the perfect new apartment in North Las Vegas is over.', 'As one of the premier apartment communities, Sedona at Lone Mountain is an ideal place to call home.', 'Offering spacious one, two and three-bedroom apartments, our pet-friendly community has everything you need for a lavish and comfortable lifestyle.', 'Amenities Include:', 'Professional onsite management', 'Vaulted ceilings', 'Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance', 'Relaxing resort-style pool                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', 'Barbecue pavilion and picnic area', 'Controlled-entry access with ample parking                                                                                         Featured amenity', 'Resident social lounge', 'Courtyard and mountain views', 'Co-working lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi', 'Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements', 'Private balcony or patio', 'State-of-the-art fitness center', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
